channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Saylah, if you click through the pics to Flickr, you can select All Sizes and view full-size screenshots.
Gesikah - same. Think a lot of guilds are cutting back until expansion time -- we reduced our schedule from 4 raid nights a week to 3. We'll probably reduce it even more during the holidays. No one has the energy anymore.
item.content:encoded:
Saylah, if you click through the pics to Flickr, you can select All Sizes and view full-size screenshots.

Gesikah – same. Think a lot of guilds are cutting back until expansion time — we reduced our schedule from 4 raid nights a week to 3. We’ll probably reduce it even more during the holidays. No one has the energy anymore.

item.title: By: gesikah
item.dc:creator: gesikah
item.description:
Huhu's room...that whore. PS I hear Huhu has a big box.
Nanny-nanny! After the disaster that was our last AQ40 run (who knew 90% of all players were practically bots?), our raid decided to cut waaaaay back on our schedule and do more pvping etc to kill time until BC. It's probably a good thing I missed like the first three hours of it or I probably would have ended up /gquitting in a very dramatic fashion.
Also I think I might be playing too much...when I was putting my info in to post, I started to put in my login name and password. Hrmm.
item.content:encoded:
Huhu’s room…that whore. PS I hear Huhu has a big box.

Nanny-nanny! After the disaster that was our last AQ40 run (who knew 90% of all players were practically bots?), our raid decided to cut waaaaay back on our schedule and do more pvping etc to kill time until BC. It’s probably a good thing I missed like the first three hours of it or I probably would have ended up /gquitting in a very dramatic fashion.

Also I think I might be playing too much…when I was putting my info in to post, I started to put in my login name and password. Hrmm.

item.title: By: Saylah
item.dc:creator: Saylah
item.description: Site changes look great. Nice modern look and feel to it. Only thing that gets me every time is that clicking on your images doesn't produce a larger version. Unless there's something I'm missing in Flicker? Many of your images are of places I haven't been so it would be nice to see a larger image.
item.content:encoded: Site changes look great. Nice modern look and feel to it. Only thing that gets me every time is that clicking on your images doesn’t produce a larger version. Unless there’s something I’m missing in Flicker? Many of your images are of places I haven’t been so it would be nice to see a larger image.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Well that would explain the snickers from the better bloggers ...
And yes, that is Princess Huhuran of Ahn'Qiraj. You might think I ran down to a partially cleared AQ to get a screenshot of an empty lair, but really i just shouted at the stupid night elves in my guild to move out of the way. Every guild screenshot there's at least 6 night elves who just HAVE to be in front of everyone.
item.content:encoded:
Well that would explain the snickers from the better bloggers …

And yes, that is Princess Huhuran of Ahn’Qiraj. You might think I ran down to a partially cleared AQ to get a screenshot of an empty lair, but really i just shouted at the stupid night elves in my guild to move out of the way. Every guild screenshot there’s at least 6 night elves who just HAVE to be in front of everyone.

item.title: By: Languish
item.dc:creator: Languish
item.description: Dude, your site looks like shit now, why did you change everything. I don't come here for a week and now the place looks like a 5 year old went crazy with fingerpaints.
item.content:encoded: Dude, your site looks like shit now, why did you change everything. I don’t come here for a week and now the place looks like a 5 year old went crazy with fingerpaints.

item.title: By: Bluekar
item.dc:creator: Bluekar
item.description: Ahh, makes me want to cast Prayer of Healing. :) Also, I like the site changes.
item.content:encoded: Ahh, makes me want to cast Prayer of Healing. ðŸ™‚ Also, I like the site changes.

item.title: By: steve

item.description: Site looks good Foton.. I likes the color scheme.
item.content:encoded: Site looks good Foton.. I likes the color scheme.

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description: I was going to say somewhere in AQ40 as I've never seen it. Probably never will. Grrr.
item.content:encoded: I was going to say somewhere in AQ40 as I’ve never seen it. Probably never will. Grrr.

item.title: By: Caffix
item.dc:creator: Caffix
item.description:
HUHUHUHUHU.
Huhuran's pad in AQ40. Worth taking some time to stare at the ceiling in this room, it's very pretty.
item.content:encoded:
HUHUHUHUHU.

Huhuran’s pad in AQ40. Worth taking some time to stare at the ceiling in this room, it’s very pretty.
